item.title: Is it possible to change an items name, answer and i'll rep++
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Grim Reaper Ownage:

i know how[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 12:16:32 AM[/size][hr]go to item.cgf then search for your item if you can’t find it add it and look at the info of the item and change the item you want. example: ‘P’ Ring I changed it to Poonage Ring on my server.

rofl or maybe your just bullshitting because you cant do it server side you have to do it client side in an item mask

so shut the hell up low lifer

item.title: Is it possible to change an items name, answer and i'll rep++
item.dc:creator: @Kriptick Kriptick
item.description:
@Kriptick wrote:

ummh well i know how to change the description of an item. like when u examine an item.

all you gotta do is open up item.cfg.

then search for the item id. eg. item = 1546
then it says the name of the item next to that it shows the description change that to watever u want but instead of spaces do underscores. eg. A_blue_key.

i think if u change the items name there it will change in the game also but i really cant garrenty i havent tryed it.

Read full topic
